import unittest



[docs]class TestAllgemein(unittest.TestCase):


[docs]    def setUp(self):
        self.b = Bruch(3, 2)
        self.b2 = Bruch(self.b)
        self.b3 = Bruch(4, 2)
        pass



[docs]    def tearDown(self):
        del self.b, self.b2, self.b3
        pass



[docs]    def testTuple(self):
        z, n = Bruch(3, 4)
        assert(z == 3 and n == 4)



[docs]    def testTuple2(self):
        z, n = self.b
        self.assertEqual(Bruch(z, n), self.b)



[docs]    def testTuple3_Error(self):
        b3 = list(self.b2)
        self.assertRaises(IndexError, self.tryIndex, b3, 3)


    @staticmethod

[docs]    def tryIndex(obj, index):
        return obj[index]


if __name__ == "__main__":
    unittest.main()
